actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to assure the free flow of information to the public.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Provides that a person connected with or employed by the news media or press shall not be compelled to disclose before any State or Federal administrative, legislative, or judicial body, except a State or Federal grand jury, any information or the source of any information procured for publication or broadcast.

titles.title: A bill to assure the free flow of information to the public.
